722465945176961024.text: Thematic Cabinet Session “Reforms for Competitiveness — 2020” has just finished. The press conference is now on, video to follow. #TSV

722465347442470916.text: #TSV PM Đukanović: We must measure success and monitor progress and effects of our reforms.

722465112704098304.text: #TSV PM Đukanović: More needs to be done to educate & train the civil service in order for them to be more productive & efficient.

722464938548203520.text: #TSV DPM Lazović & JM Pažin: Best & fastest way to reform public administration & improve its efficiency is eGovernment.

722431847628718082.text: #TSV PM MĐ: Consider the systematic nature of our tax system, remove complications in its application, and reduce this burden on income.

722431779278295045.text: #TSV PM Đukanović: We must not so much as think of raising taxes, we must  instead carefully think as to how to reduce them further.

722431608469483521.text: #TSV MF Žugić & MP Pažin: Need to incriminate deliberate evasion of salary taxes & at same time protect those who have difficulties.

722431515725053952.text: #TSV Human&Minority Rights Min. Numanović: GPs should be empowered for better primary care & reduce sending patients to specialist MDs.

722431448452636672.text: #TSV Finance Minister Žugić: We must do all we can to ensure our healthcare system is sustainable & in the best interest of citizens.

722431354235928578.text: #TSV PM Đukanović: A shift should be made — instead of regional development we should focus on supporting business zones.

722387921316265985.text: #TSV Labour&Social Welfare Min. Kovačević: More market flexibility&mobility, preventing unregistered labour, eliminating social care abuse

722387736901128192.text: #TSV @VujicaL: Goals: Active workforce from 86% to 91% of EU average, 15-64yo employment from 51% to 56%, 20k new jobs, 10k€ GDP p/c by 2025
